evidence.claim: The company uses AWS services for backend processing and data storage.
AC Health App complies with HIPAA standards for data handling and storage.
They utilize HL7 FHIR standards for their health data interoperability.
The app processes X12 837 transaction sets for claims processing.
Integration with major EHR systems is part of their platform solution.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions found on the site.
